entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as having an argument with Bill about his hair.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as being in an argument with Mrs. Weasley about his hair.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being asked for his opinion on Bill's hair.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as winking and beckoning Harry closer.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as holding out a hand to Harry with shriveled black pods.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is mentioned as talking to Fred and George before stopping when he sees Harry.

entities.name: dung
entities.description: Dung is a nickname for Mundungus.

entities.name: shrivelled black pods
entities.description: The shriveled black pods are mentioned as being held out to Harry by George.

relationships.description: Fred tells Mundungus that they can trust Harry.
George gives the shriveled black pods to Harry.
